Package utm

Class TuringMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • utm.TuringMachine
  • public class TuringMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract data type for a Turing Machine.
    Author:
    Damian Arellanes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TuringMachine​(int rulesNumber, java.lang.String initialState, java.lang.String acceptState, java.lang.String rejectState)
      Creates a TM with no rules.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TuringMachine

        public TuringMachine​(int rulesNumber,
                     java.lang.String initialState,
                     java.lang.String acceptState,
                     java.lang.String rejectState)
        Creates a TM with no rules.
        Parameters:
        rulesNumber - The number of rules that the machine will have.
        initialState - A string representing the TM's initial state.
        acceptState - A string representing the TM's accept state.
        rejectState - A string representing the TM's reject state.

    • Method Detail

      • addRule

        public void addRule​(java.lang.String currentState,
                    char currentSymbol,
                    java.lang.String newState,
                    char newSymbol,
                    Move move)
        Adds a new rule into the array of rules of the TM (Note that the maximum number of rules was specified during construction).
        Parameters:
        currentState - A string representing state for triggering the rule.
        currentSymbol - A character representing symbol for triggering the rule.
        newState - A string representing the TM's state after triggering the rule.
        newSymbol - A character that will be written on the current cell after triggering the rule.
        move - The head movement that will be performed after triggering the rule.

      • getTape

        public Tape getTape()
        Gets the current tape of the TM.
        Returns:
        The abstract data type of the TM's tape.

      • setTape

        public void setTape​(Tape tape)
        Replaces the TM's tape with a new one.
        Parameters:
        tape - The tape that will replace the existing one.

      • getHead

        public Head getHead()
        Gets the head of the TM.
        Returns:
        The abstract data type of the TM's head.

      • getRules

        public java.lang.String[][] getRules()
        Gets the rules of the TM.
        Returns:
        A bidimensional array of rules where each rule has the form {currentState, currentSymbol, newState, newSymbol, move}.

      • getInitialState

        public java.lang.String getInitialState()
        Gets the initial state of the TM.
        Returns:
        A string representing the TM's initial state.

      • getAcceptState

        public java.lang.String getAcceptState()
        Gets the accept state of the TM.
        Returns:
        A string representing the TM's accept state.

      • getRejectState

        public java.lang.String getRejectState()
        Gets the reject state of the TM.
        Returns:
        A string representing the TM's reject state.
